channel.title: Need help editing my server "help please"
channel.description: Hey i just recently got my server up it runs but i want to edit things such as where npcs are what items shop sell where monster respawn stuff like that. and i was wondering if someon could give me a brief tutorial here or a program that lets you just place the npcs/items in thanks greatly apreciate.

item.title: Need help editing my server "help please"
item.dc:creator: @Stabios11 Stabios11
item.description:
@Stabios11 wrote:

It just isnâ€™t a program placing stuff.

Using stuff like your autospawn.cfg,shops.cfg,npc.cfg.

Its more just using a bunch of your time editing stuff.

Look around and you should find some tuts on placing stuff.

Read full topic
